Title: Put a DPAD on that GC! | .NET Blog
Description: Say what? Yes, there's a new feature called DPAD for regions – regions is what we are currently working on in .NET 6 to convert segments to. In this blog post I will first give some introduction to regions then talk about the DPAD feature.

Title: 'Modern Visual Basic' Mercury Language Debuts -- Visual Studio Magazine
Description: RemObjects has debuted the Mercury programming language, described as a modern Visual Basic 'with a future' for all platforms.

Title: Private-equity firm revives zombie fossil-fuel power plant to mine bitcoin
Description: Power plant was left for dead until the cryptocurrency boom came along.

Title: The 0-RTT Feature of TLS 1.3 Can Be Used As an Encrypted Steganographic Channel to Operate a Backdoor into an Enterprise Network – Pomcor
Description: The TLS 1.3 specification in RFC 8446 allows the client to send application data to the server immediately after the ClientHello message, with zero round-trip time, and refers to that data as 0-RTT data or early data.

Title: C# Language Highlights: Init only setters
